Enchantment 5

Quagmire

spell id [id]: 914
effect number [effect_number]: 81

area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster

Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Quagmire
Water will start to seep from the ground that will quickly become soft and difficult to traverse. The battleground is turned into a swamp and most units will get penalized for fighting there. The enchantment lasts for the entire battle or until the caster dies.
All units without Swamp Survival suffer -1 Att, -1 Def, +2 Enc and -20% combat speed.
